tool_description: Parses and validates role definitions with their associated permissions and constraints.

role_name.description: Name of the role to parse

permissions.description: List of permissions associated with the role

expiration_hours.description: Role expiration in hours (0 means no expiration)

error_messages: Invalid role name: Role name must be a non-empty string without special characters.
Empty permissions list: At least one permission must be specified.
Invalid permission format: Permissions must follow the format 'resource:action'.
Invalid expiration: Expiration hours must be a non-negative integer.
Constraint parsing error: Constraints must be valid conditional expressions.
usage: Provide role_name and permissions array. Optionally add role_description, constraints, and expiration_hours for complete role definition.

role_id.description: Generated unique identifier for the role

role_level.description: Calculated access level of the role

is_privileged.description: Whether the role has elevated privileges
